I was BORED that’s y

item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“john5689, post:9, topic:288961”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=382016.msg2869994#msg2869994 date=1247693846]
They’re useless without the models…
[/quote]

There wasen’t any model for the capes

Why did you post these?..

I was BORED that’s y

Whats the point of this?

The point was that if people don’t have skillcapes then they can just copy from here[/quote]

Don’t post a topic solely on the reason that you’re bored.
That’s pathetic.

They’re useless without the models, unless you need the zooms and rotations for a cape, but i would say 99% of clients will have a cape model of some sort that they can borrow ints from.
